photo.caption: Fernando El Flodo and Pierre Resistance
OK, so the game is Texas Hold 'Em and you would have to deal the same game, even though you're from another land.
Helen thinks: 'I wonder if a straight beats a flush.' Marco El Flodo thinks: 'Go ahead and Hofferize the pot, I will simply fold.'
Yeah, see! Yeah. Yeah, see, yeah!
'You know, Pierre, my favorite genocidal dictator is Papa Smurf.'
